Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApolloCard, ArtemisCard, AthenaCard, AtlasCard, ChronusCard, DemeterCard, HephaestusCard, HeraCard, HestiaCard, MinotaurCard, PanCard, PrometheusCard, TritonCard, ZeusCard
public abstract class Card
extends Observable
implements Playable
This class represents the "base 2-player game". The methods describe the default procedure of completing their tasks (without any godpower). All godcards extends this class and redefine some of the basic behaviours.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup()
      This method operates some actions on the environment to allow the card to work properly. It is called during the game initialization, right after the cards are selected and created. In the general case, a card does not need to setup anything to function. This method is needed to generalize the procedure and allow some subclasses to define their own routine.

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      This method operates some actions on the environment to allow the card to be removed without problems. It is called when the card owner loses. In the general case, a card does not need to do anything to be removed with success. This method is needed to generalize the procedure and allow some subclasses to define their own routine.

    • selectWorker

      public void selectWorker​(Worker worker)
      Select a Worker between those owned by the current player. This worker will be the one to move and build in the next phases.
      Specified by:
      selectWorker in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker indicated for selection

    • move

      public void move​(Tile destinationTile)
      Move the selected Worker to the specified tile. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToMove.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      destinationTile - The Tile where the worker is going to be moved to

    • build

      public void build​(Tile builtTile)
      Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToBuild.
      Specified by:
      build in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      builtTile - The Tile where the worker will build

    • useGodPower

      public void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
      Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower. The specific actions done vary from card to card. Not all cards actually use this method.
      Specified by:
      useGodPower in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      isUsed - Indicates if the godpower will be used this turn.

    • getTilesToMove

      public java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove​(Tile tile)
      Generate all possible moves from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of movement.
      Specified by:
      getTilesToMove in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile where the worker is currently placed
      Returns:
      All possible tiles where the worker can move

    • getTilesToMove

      public java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove()
      Specified by:
      getTilesToMove in interface Playable
      Returns:
      The already generated set of possible moves

    • setTurnPhase

      protected void setTurnPhase()
      Computes and sets the next turn phase. This is called at the end of every phase-specific method.

    • setCanChangeWorkerSelection

      public void setCanChangeWorkerSelection​(boolean canChangeWorkerSelection)
      Set if it is still possible to change selected worker.
      Specified by:
      setCanChangeWorkerSelection in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      canChangeWorkerSelection - indicate if it is still possible to change selected worker

    • canChangeWorkerSelection

      public boolean canChangeWorkerSelection()

    • render

      protected void render()
      Computes the set of feasible next moves, depending on the current turn phase. Dynamically calls Card#getTilesToMove or Card#getTilesToBuild
